channel.title: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Deal on plans to boost Europe’s Net-Zero technology production
item.description:
On Tuesday, Parliament and Council negotiators reached a provisional deal on the Net-Zero industry Act to bolster EU production in technologies needed for decarbonisation.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2024 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Electricity market: deal on protecting consumers from sudden price shocks
item.description:
On Thursday, Parliament and Council negotiators informally agreed on the reform of the EU electricity market, to make it more stable, affordable, and sustainable.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Artificial Intelligence Act: deal on comprehensive rules for trustworthy AI
item.description:
MEPs reached a political deal with the Council on a bill to ensure AI in Europe is safe, respects fundamental rights and democracy, while businesses can thrive and expand.
Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection
Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Green Deal: agreement on reform of EU gas and hydrogen market governance
item.description:
On Friday, MEPs and the Spanish Presidency of the Council informally agreed on plans to facilitate the uptake of renewable and low-carbon gases, including hydrogen, on the EU’s gas market.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Cybersecurity: MEPs back plans to increase cooperation against threats
item.description:
The “Cyber Solidarity Act” adopted on Thursday aims to build a more resilient, collective EU response against cybercrime.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Cyber Resilience Act: agreement with Council to boost digital products’ security
item.description:
On Thursday night, MEPs reached a deal with the Presidency of the Council on new cyber resilience rules to protect all digital products in the EU from cyber threats.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Deal reached on gas market reform to address energy security and climate change
item.description:
On Tuesday, MEPs and the Spanish Presidency of the Council agreed on plans to facilitate the uptake of renewable and low-carbon gases, including hydrogen, into the EU gas market.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Right to repair: press conference with lead MEP
item.description:
On Tuesday at 14.30, rapporteur René Repasi will brief journalists on the outcome of the plenary vote on the right to repair.
Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Critical raw materials: deal on securing the EU's supply and sovereignty
item.description:
MEPs and the Spanish presidency of the Council agreed on plans to boost the supply of strategic raw materials, on Monday.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Parliament backs plans for better access to, and use of, data
item.description:
The "Data Act", already agreed between MEPs and member states, aims to stimulate innovation by eliminating barriers to data access.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - EU-wide digital wallet: MEPs reach deal with Council
item.description:
Parliament and Council negotiators reached a provisional agreement on Wednesday on the creation of a pan-European digital identity framework.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Political advertising: deal on new measures to crack down on abuse
item.description:
On Monday evening, EU co-legislators reached a provisional deal on new rules to make election and referenda campaigns more transparent and resistant to interference.
Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - MEPs back plans to boost Europe's Net-Zero technology production
item.description:
The legislation voted on by the Industry Committee on Wednesday is intended to bolster Europe's manufacturing output in technologies needed for decarbonisation.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - A STEP towards supporting EU competitiveness and resilience in strategic sectors
item.description:
The “Strategic Technologies for Europe Platform” aims to boost digital, net-zero and biotechnologies and enable the EU's industry to achieve the digital and net-zero transitions.
Committee on Budgets
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - A STEP towards supporting EU competitiveness and resilience in strategic sectors
item.description:
The “Strategic Technologies for Europe Platform” aims to boost digital, net-zero and biotechnologies and enable the EU's industry to achieve the digital and net-zero transitions.
Committee on Budgets
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Critical raw materials: Securing the EU's supply and sovereignty
item.description:
On Thursday, MEPs adopted their position on boosting the supply of strategic raw materials, crucial to secure the EU’s transition to a sustainable, digital and sovereign future.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Creating a more stable, affordable and sustainable electricity market
item.description:
Parliament today gave the green light to start negotiations with Council to reform the EU’s electricity market.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - MEPs back plans to boost use of renewable energy
item.description:
Parliament on Tuesday voted to boost the deployment of renewable energy, in line with the Green Deal and REPowerEU plans.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - MEPs confirm Iliana Ivanova as new Commissioner
item.description:
The European Parliament today approved the appointment of Iliana Ivanova (Bulgaria) as Commissioner for innovation, research, culture, education and youth.
Committee on Culture and Education
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Critical raw materials: MEPs back plans to secure EU's own supply and sovereignty
item.description:
The Industry Committee adopted measures to boost the supply of strategic raw materials, crucial to secure the EU’s transition towards a sustainable, digital and sovereign future.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - MEPs back plans to protect consumers from energy market manipulation
item.description:
The law aims to tackle increased market manipulation by strengthening transparency, oversight mechanisms, and the role of the agency for the cooperation of energy regulators.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Media Advisory: Hearing of Commissioner-designate Iliana Ivanova on 5 September
item.description:
This advisory provides practical information on the hearing of Iliana Ivanova (Bulgaria) taking place on 5 September from 9.30 to 12.30.
Committee on Culture and Education
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - Cyber Resilience Act: MEPs back plan to boost digital products security
item.description:
New cyber resilience rules adopted on Wednesday will establish a uniform set of cybersecurity requirements for all digital products in the European Union.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - MEPs back plans for a more affordable and consumer-friendly electricity market
item.description:
The reform of the electricity market, to make it more stable, affordable and sustainable, received the support of the Energy Committee on Wednesday.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
item.source: Internal market and industry - European Parliament

item.title: Press release - MEPs approve plans to provide more ammunition for Ukraine
item.description:
On Thursday, Parliament adopted plans to increase EU production of ammunition and missiles to address the current shortage.
Committee on Industry, Research and Energy

Source : © European Union, 2023 - EP
